text: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن ثَبَّتۡنَٰكَ لَقَدۡ كِدتَّ تَرۡكَنُ إِلَيۡهِمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا قَلِيلًا

translation.en: And if We had not strengthened you, you would have almost inclined to them a little
translation.id: Dan sekiranya Kami tidak memperteguh (hati)mu, niscaya engkau hampir saja condong sedikit kepada mereka
